segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, climbing on that stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, it looks like he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless they're being, especially with the floor all wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're going to get into so much trouble if their mom catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing things like this when I was a kid, but it never ended well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't break anything or hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR
